event.title: Wildlife Documentary Screening
event.description: A public outdoor screening of famous wildlife documentaries, showcasing the beauty and diversity of the animal kingdom.

event.title: Safari Night Adventure
event.description: Join a guided night walk through the safari zone to experience the wonder of nocturnal animals in their natural environment

event.title: Meet the Reptiles
event.description: Get up close and personal with some of the world's most fascinating reptiles, learning about their habits and biology.

event.title: Zoo Festival
event.description: A fun-filled weekend festival featuring live music, food stalls, animal encounters, and entertainment for all zoo visitors.

event.title: Penguin Feeding Frenzy
event.description: Watch the penguins dive into action during their feeding time and learn interesting facts about their lives.

event.title: Corporate Wildlife Dinner
event.description: An exclusive wildlife-themed dinner event for corporate guests, including a private animal encounter and networking opportunities.

event.title: Animal Care Workshop
event.description: Learn the ins and outs of animal care in this private workshop, including hands-on activities and training with zookeepers.

event.title: Enchanted Butterfly Wedding
event.description: Celebrate your special day in the magical Butterfly Garden, surrounded by fluttering butterflies. This package includes a ceremony amidst lush greenery, a romantic dinner, and a special butterfly release to mark the beginning of your new journey together.
